/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the blue sky. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the scene. In the distance, buildings rise, their architecture hinting at the blend of tradition and modernity that characterizes Beijing. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the trees and buildings.
